bibl.title: Texts from the "Archive" of Socrates, the Tax Collector, and Other Contexts at Karanis (P. Cair. Mich. II)
bibl.seg: Mohamed Gaber El-Maghrabi & Cornelia Römer (Edited by), with contributions by S. El-Masry, R. El-Mofatch, F. Hamouda, D. Leith, N. Reggiani, E.A. Selim & S. Soliman, Texts from the "Archive" of Socrates, the Tax Collector, and Other Texts at Karanis (P. Cair. Mich. II) = ArchPF. Beiheft 35.
Berlin - Boston, de Gruyter, 2015, 8°, xviii-148 pp., figg. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-3-11-034215-4. €98.

P. Cairo Mich. II, 1-24. - Preface. - Introduction. - A. Literary Texts from the "Archive" of Socrates, the Tax Collector (House B17) (1-5). - B. Literary Texts from Street BS1 in Front of B17, and Other Houses (6-11). - C. Documentary Texts from the "Archive" of Socrates, the Tax Collector (House B17) and Street BS1 (12-20). - D. Documents from Other locations in Karanis (21-24). - Bibliography. Indexes.
C.R. par Serena Perrone, RivFil 145 (2017) pp. 215-220. - Peter van Minnen, BASP 53 (2016) pp. 419-420.
